Features: - AI-powered text processing with OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google Gemini - Global hotkey support (Cmd+Shift+9) - Native macOS integration with menu bar - Secure API key storage in Keychain - Dynamic prompt system - Auto-update functionality with Sparkle framework <<<<<<< HEAD - Improved storage adapter system - Enhanced error handling
This release includes the StorageAdapter system for improved API key management.</description> <pubDate>Sat, 22 Jun 2025 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate> <enclosure
